document_data.name: ''Target Arrow''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Target arrows''''' were [[enchanted]] [[arrows]] designed for aim but not deadliness.
document_data.Powers: Unlike many other arrows, ''target arrows'' were masterfully crafted to be used in various tournaments. Their design ensured longer flight and increased accuracy, but despite that, these arrows lacked a punch to damage thicker types of [[armor]] or hires of some tougher beasts.
document_data.History: ''Target arrows'' were used by the inhabitants of [[Icewind Dale]] and the southern slopes of the [[Spine of the World]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
